subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A feud between the Nascar drivers Kyle Busch and Kevin Harvick, which led to fines and suspensions, shows little signs of abating.
snippet: A feud between the Nascar drivers Kyle Busch and Kevin Harvick, which led to fines and suspensions, shows little signs of abating.
